title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Further and Higher Education,
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Further and Higher Education, 
Research, Innovation and Science (Transfer of Departmental Administration and 
Ministerial Functions) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 1 April 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited higher education research innovation science (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2025 (2) order shall come operation 1 april 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

(2) References to the Department of Education contained in any Act or any 
instrument made under such Act and relating to any administration and business 
transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Department of Further and Higher Education, 
Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department higher education research innovation science (2) reference department education contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Education by or under the
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Education by or under the 
Financial Measures (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2009 (No. 14 of 2009) are 
transferred to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

(2) References to the Minister for Education contained in any Act or 
instrument made under such Act and relating to any functions transferred by 
paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this Order, be construed as 
references to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister education financial measure (miscellaneous provisions) act 2009 (no 14 2009) transferred minister higher education research innovation science (2) reference minister education contained act instrument made act relating function transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference minister higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Education is a party and the 
proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister 
for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, the name 
of the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and 
Science shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any functions transferred by 
this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of the Minister for 
Education or added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the 
proceedings shall not abate by reason of such substitution. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [105] 3

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Education may, in so far as it relates to a 
function transferred by this Order to the Minister for Further and Higher 
Education, Research, Innovation and Science, be carried on or completed on or 
after such commencement by the Minister for Further and Higher Education, 
Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister education may far relates function transferred order minister higher education research innovation science carried completed commencement minister higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and in so far as 
it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall far operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Education contained in the constitution of
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Education contained in the constitution of 
any company and relating to any function transferred by this Order shall, from 
the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 7 reference minister education contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Education in connection with 
the functions transferred by this Order are transferred to the Minister for Further 
and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science and, accordingly, 
without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such commencement 
- 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science. 

(2) 
All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science by this Article 
which, on the commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the 
Minister for Education shall, on the request of the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science be transferred into the 
name of the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation 
and Science. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

25 March, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
